description: Students celebrated their academic journey, receiving diplomas and posing with joy at the graduation ceremony, marking the memorable end of their college years.
Participants presented their scientific models and research projects, impressing judges with innovative ideas, critical thinking, and hands-on experimentation.
Our development team built a functional prototype in 24 hours during the hackathon, combining coding expertise, speed, and creativity to win first place.
BBA students pitched groundbreaking business ideas to a panel of investors and professors, showing strong strategy, market research, and financial planning.
High-achieving students received awards for outstanding grade point averages, dedication to study, and consistent academic performance across all semesters.
BA students demonstrated excellent oratory skills and critical thinking in an inter-college debate, winning with persuasive arguments and confident delivery.
B-Pharma students received recognition for presenting novel research on drug delivery systems, showing deep pharmaceutical insight and scientific rigor.
Students from the finance club aced the quiz competition, showcasing strong knowledge of economics, markets, banking, and financial instruments.
Volunteers in the college organized a cleanliness drive across the campus, promoting environmental hygiene and team spirit among students.
Engineering students gathered to present space-technology research, with rocket models and simulations highlighting innovation and scientific curiosity.
Future leaders from different courses participated in a workshop focusing on leadership, communication, and team-building skills to grow professionally.
Students impressed with their eloquent speeches and confident delivery in the public speaking contest, reflecting passion and smart preparation.
Creative minds showcased their artistic talent through sketching and painting, bringing imaginative themes to life with vivid visuals and skill.
A group of students organized a volunteer campaign engaging the local community in health checks, education support, and social upliftment activities.
Students collected and donated hundreds of books to underprivileged schools, promoting literacy and spreading the joy of reading.
Dance teams performed high-energy routines competing for the top prize, showing coordination, rhythm, and innovative choreography.
Musically gifted students performed singing and instrumental pieces, filling the auditorium with talent, passion, and harmony.
Students presented their original research findings at a national conference, impressing professors and peers with rigorous methodology and clarity.
Students came together to plant hundreds of saplings around the campus, contributing to a greener environment and sustainable future.
Our athletes excelled in multiple sports events across the annual sports meet, showcasing their fitness, dedication, and excellent sportsmanship.
Engineering teams designed autonomous robots to compete in obstacle courses, demonstrating agility, precision, and competitive spirit.
Student entrepreneurs pitched real-world startup ideas to investors and mentors, showcasing creativity, business acumen, and market understanding.
Industry experts and academics delivered powerful guest lectures, inspiring students with insights into innovation, careers, and professional growth.
Students captured stunning images around campus and city life, competing in creativity and composition in the photography contest.
Students organized a blood donation camp on campus, promoting health awareness and community service by encouraging peers to save lives.
A hands-on workshop on web development, AI, and mobile app building helped students build prototypes and learn latest technologies.
BSc students presented chemical experiments and live demonstrations, blending theory with practical learning to wow the audience.
Teams of BBA students competed to design strategic business plans and models, focusing on market research, pitching, and financial viability.
Students came together for an open-mic music jam, performing vocals and instruments to build a vibrant, collaborative musical community.
Green club students launched eco-friendly campaigns including recycling, energy saving, and awareness drives to foster sustainable campus life.
Pharmacy students worked on novel drug compounds, offering innovative solutions in drug discovery, formulation, and safety testing.
Alumni returned to the campus for the annual meet, sharing experiences, mentorship, and networking with current students.
Senior students mentored freshmen on academics and personal growth, creating long-lasting bonds and academic support systems.
Top performers in semester exams received awards for outstanding scores, consistency, and dedication to their studies.
Students took initiative to beautify the campus with gardens, murals, and clean-up drives, making the environment more vibrant and welcoming.
Talented students performed classical and contemporary piano pieces, showcasing their mastery and emotional connection to music.
Students volunteered in local communities offering free tutoring, health checks, and awareness sessions to underprivileged groups.
Participants completed a rigorous coding bootcamp, building full-stack projects and refining their software engineering skills.
Students organized a national day celebration on campus with speeches, flag hoisting, and cultural performances reflecting patriotic zeal.
Outstanding student leaders were honored with awards recognizing their service, guidance, and motivating role in college community building.
Teachers receiving appreciation awards for their dedication, mentorship, and impactful teaching methods during the annual faculty recognition ceremony.
Students participated in a mindfulness and stress-relief workshop, learning meditation techniques and practices for mental well-being.
Organizers held a charity fundraiser to support local schools, raising funds while engaging students in social good and community empathy.
A student was honored with the outstanding achievement award for academic excellence, leadership, and community service.
Teams of business students developed innovative marketing plans and won the inter-college marketing contest with strong proposals.
Students organized a cultural gala with dance, music, and drama performances that celebrated diversity and creativity under vivid lights.
Graduating students received admission into top-tier master’s programs, marking the beginning of their advanced academic journeys.
Participants read for 24 hours straight in a reading marathon, promoting literacy, endurance, and passion for books across campus.
Successful entrepreneurs visited the college to share their startup journey, challenges, and insights, inspiring future business leaders.
Talented musicians performed a recital evening featuring classical and modern compositions, creating a soulful and memorable musical experience.
